task.summary: Added a couple more commands, for instance "show posts".
Added logging in/logging out and will now support multiple accounts.
Users can now add a bio to their profile
Saving feature added, however passwords aren't safe, since they are stored in files
Passwords are not encrypted with the Vigenere cipher. Not 100% safe from hackers, but still more safe then before!

Improved UI. The program now validates the input after each input (when creating account) instead of giving feedback after all data is passed in. Also prints data requirements BEFORE user enters info.
Users now can get a list of users and also remove their account
Both username and bio are now encrypted (just in case if this info is useful for hackers xD)
Added easter egg: If you type "show json", it will print out the contents of the JSON file used to store info. The password, username and bio are still encrypted in the message however! :D
Instead of printing the JSON in a ugly format, it will now use the pprint (pretty print) library to print it in a "prettier" format.
Program will now not except two accounts for one email.
Program will now not except two accounts for one email.
Added a new command called "edit profile" that lets you change either your email, password or bio.
Added a new command called "edit profile" that lets you change either your email, password or bio.
Refactored/Made more Pythonic by omitting the getters and setters in the class definitions and not using the functions in the main program. Also fixed a couple PEP 8 warnings.

MESSAGE.value: Added a couple more commands, for instance "show posts".
Added logging in/logging out and will now support multiple accounts.
Users can now add a bio to their profile
Saving feature added, however passwords aren't safe, since they are stored in files
Passwords are not encrypted with the Vigenere cipher. Not 100% safe from hackers, but still more safe then before!

Improved UI. The program now validates the input after each input (when creating account) instead of giving feedback after all data is passed in. Also prints data requirements BEFORE user enters info.
Users now can get a list of users and also remove their account
Both username and bio are now encrypted (just in case if this info is useful for hackers xD)
Added easter egg: If you type "show json", it will print out the contents of the JSON file used to store info. The password, username and bio are still encrypted in the message however! :D
Instead of printing the JSON in a ugly format, it will now use the pprint (pretty print) library to print it in a "prettier" format.
Program will now not except two accounts for one email.
Added a new command called "edit profile" that lets you change either your email, password or bio.
Refactored/Made more Pythonic by omitting the getters and setters in the class definitions and not using the functions in the main program. Also fixed a couple PEP 8 warnings.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
